CmdLine: apt update  && apt upgrade -y  && apt install -y build-essential python3 python3-pip python3-dev python3-cffi libffi-dev redis-server libpq5 libcairo2 libpango1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 shared-mime-info vim  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*  && pip3 -q --no-cache-dir install -U pip wheel setuptools  && hash -r pip  && pip3 -q install supervisor
Commands.Name: run
